message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can find a better price. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $165.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $145 for the product.
I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $145. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $160.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $157.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued negotiation efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $152.5 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $155. I think this is a fair price, considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $153.75 for the product.
